column2: an A.M. Eatery////I hate that I keep disappointing myself by going back to this establishment. I feel that I am a fairly understanding person
column3: Â but I definitely don't understand why their service is so slow when there is hardly anyone in there. This is the second time I have placed an order over the phone and was informed that my order was being started when I walk in. The young staff seem to take their time with every task except of maybe 2-3 servers. They have horrible over the phone service
column4: failing to let me know when they are out of items
column5: failing to tell me the price of my order (especially when they surprise me with an upcharge)
column6: and failing to check the food before they hand it to me. Snooze just doesn't seem to be the same anymore. :(
